messages.title: A message from Angus
messages.content: Edinburgh Central needs an MSP committed to putting Scotland’s recovery in Scotland’s hands. Having grown up in Edinburgh Central I understand the issues which matter to the diverse communities across our capital.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The SNP has a pandemic recovery plan aimed at protecting the NHS, for a National Care Service and to secure and create jobs as we get on with the job of building a better Scotland.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If Westminster maintains control, the real risk is they will wreck Scotland’s recovery with their austerity agenda, job-destroying hard Brexit and growing threat to our NHS. If Edinburgh Central retains the Tories they have a six to one majority over the SNP and every vote will count in defeating Boris Johnson’s party.

leaflet.personalStatement: Your SNP candidate Angus Robertson is one of the country’s most experienced campaigners and parliamentarians. He was an MP for 16 years, Westminster SNP Group Leader for a decade and SNP Deputy Leader to Nicola Sturgeon.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Ross Crombie on behalf of Angus Robertson, both of The St Andrew Rooms, 16 North St Andrew Street, EH2 1HJ. Made and DO Printed by Evolution Group, Edinburgh.
